_sText:
Welcome to the new Version of mg jacks bhop battle FINAL
==================
IMPORTANT NOTE
------------------
> Please update to the fixed Version. The Old Version had some laggs caused of weapon spammers


### Let's Go
> Well, this is the new Version of Bhop Battle V4. In my opinion I improved the map really much. But the Features of the map i will tell ya later. This map should beat the old version in many points like design, music, endings and whatelse.

Features:
------------

- 4 Random played musics
- 2 Secrets
- 4 Fight Maps
- Lego style
- No Top
- Live Camera to the Player at the end

### What gets the Player who beat the map?
- He can choice again the music(see pictures)
- he gain 200 Health
- Can choose his weapons
- Can choose the map to play


	Thats all what I can say, but don't worry the Multigame map will be come in the next weeks :) Please Comment and Rate, Post Feedback and Improvements.

###### Do you need a good Server to play on? Join: 37.157.252.236:27015
